items.sentence: I saw Tom spray painting something on the wall.
I've been working at this bar for three months.
I received a text from Tom saying he'd be late.
There are parts of Boston that I've never seen.
My girlfriend is quite a bit younger than I am.
My first job was mowing lawns for my neighbors.
I've been studying astronomy since I was a kid.
I'm glad we didn't try to do that by ourselves.
Tom's parents have grounded him for three days.
Tom's chances of being elected are pretty good.
Could you please tell me where Tom's office is?
I don't often win when playing tennis with Tom.
Let me assure you that that wasn't intentional.
Tom's room is a lot messier than his brother's.
My father works for the company as an engineer.
It might take more than a month to finish this.
Are you absolutely sure that's going to happen?
I want to be the best person I possibly can be.
I want to go to college, but I can't afford to.
We stayed up talking until 2:30 in the morning.
